page.title: 09PEOPLE AND JOBS IN COUSLAND
page.content: OUR CLASS MADE A SURVEY OF 83 HOUSES, OUT OF ABOUT 100 IN THE AREA. THESE ARE THE FACTS ABOUT POPULATION AND JOBS. THERE WERE 284 PEOPLE LIVING IN THE 83 HOUSES. OF THESE 103 WERE IN THE AGE GROUP 0-20 YEARS, 106 IN THE AGE GROUP 21-40 YEARS, 49 IN THE AGE GROUP 41-60 YEARS, AND 26 PEOPLE OVER 60 YEARS. MOST PEOPLE IN EMPLOYMENT WORK OUTSIDE THE LOCAL AREA IN NEARBY TOWNS, SUCH AS EDINBURGH OR DALKEITH. THERE WERE 28 PEOPLE EMPLOYED IN THE PROFESSIONS e.g. TEACHING, MEDICINE. THERE WERE 22 PEOPLE IN CLERICAL WORK e.g. SECRETARIES, 18 PEOPLE IN AGRICULTURE AND FISHING, 43 SKILLED WORKERS, e.g. ENGINEERS, 18 NON-SKILLED WORKERS, AND 27 FULL-TIME HOUSEWIVES.
